author: EXM7777
text:
top 4 things i bought this year that drastically improved my setup...

- monitor light bar (saves your eyes & takes zero space)
- ultrawide curved display (more efficient than dual monitor setup, at least on macos)
- oil diffuser (i'll drop the sauce for this in my tg)
- physical notebook (to scribble down tweets

good quality-of-life upgrades for less than $500
